nodes.text: Onicrop K'Cin was a male Ugnaught engineer affiliated with the Galactic Podracing Mechanics' Union who was wanted by the Trade Federation Recruitment Center for having knowledge of Trade Federation encryption codes, and for being a master of forged identity. In 32 BBY, they assumed he would use this against them. Jango Fett claimed the bounty on Onicrop K'Cin for 1,500 credits sometime after the Battle of Naboo.
Onicrop is located in the second level of chapter one is the second bounty to encounter. He is worth 1,500 credits for him alive and 750 for him dead.
His name is the reverse of LucasArts employee Nick Porcino.
